# #Create DataFrame for the dboplclpnroutinghistorycenturion LMS Table
# dboplclpnroutinghistorycenturion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboplc_lpnrouting_history_centurion.parquet', format='parquet')
# dboplclpnroutinghistorycenturion.createOrReplaceTempView("dboplclpnroutinghistorycenturion")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
centurionsorterreport
AS
SELECT

 c.id
,c.autosystemid
,c.lpn
,c.status
,c.datereceived as date
,c.dateupdated
,c.plcdivertid
,cldivertid
,c.divertdescription
,p.lms_parcel_orderbillcustid as billingcustomerid
,p.lms_parcel_orderbillcustname as billingcustomer
,p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid as deliverycustomerid
,p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustname as deliverycustomer
,p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustcref as deliverycustcref
,p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustsrouteid as deliverycustsrouteid
,p.lms_parcel_sroutedescriptiondelivercust as deliverycustsroutedescription
,p.lms_parcel_sroutecodedelivercust as deliverycustsroutecode


FROM dboplclpnroutinghistorycenturion c
LEFT JOIN rptparcellevel p on p.lms_parcel_barcode  = c.lpn
WHERE c.datereceived >= to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01')
